name: Death and Taxes (itch) (aguvar)
description:
In this blood-curling card game you must avoid as many taxes as you can while still living out your fragile mortal life! Will you succumb to the inevitability of death or pay your taxes like a good citizen?

Each card represents your choice for the day, they all have consequences, even the ones you don't choose.

Our submission for the Ludum Dare 50
